name: Catastrophe (To Hardware)
description:
Story:

You are a caty lady whose hobby slowly progresses into madness and adopts more and more cats, and a bird for some reason forgetting that the cats are its arch nemesis. You have to bathe your cats every day but as you suspect they will try and run away.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow keys to move
SPACEBAR to interact(Picku up cats and put them in the bathtub)

How to play:

To win the level you need to get all the cats in the bathtub, but dont let the cats eat your bird. If you see they standing next to it you should rush to pick them up. Also be careful of the neighbours dog as hes there for some "foul play"... Find the cat hes aiming(PS it might be one with a red dot on it) at and pick her up to save her from him!
